cms.query.QueryText: DECLARE @ResourceID int; SET @ResourceID = (SELECT FIRST ResourceID FROM CMS_Resource WHERE ResourceName = @ResourceName); DECLARE @PermissionID int; SET @PermissionID = (SELECT FIRST PermissionID FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionName = @PermissionName); DECLARE @UserID int; SET @UserID = (SELECT FIRST UserID FROM CMS_User WHERE UserName = @UserName); SELECT * FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionID = @PermissionID AND ResourceID = @ResourceID AND PermissionID IN ( SELECT PermissionID FROM CMS_RolePermission WHERE RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_UserRole WHERE UserID = @UserID) )
